decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (01, 02, 04, HA-05A, HA-06A, HA-07A, HA-08B, HA-09B, HA-10B, Location Plan and Design and Access Statement received on 06/03/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.

Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the south eastern elevation of the extension hereby approved and no additional doors inserted in the building without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The windows formed in the south eastern elevation shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
Condition : 6 - No more than 7 residents (including caretaker/landlord) shall reside at the property at any one time.

Condition : 7 - Full details of bin storage to be submitted and approved prior to commencement of works.  The bin storage shall be implemented in accordance with the approved details prior to the occupation of the extensions hereby approved and retained in that form for as long as the development remains in existence.

Condition : 8 - The room annotated as 'store' on the proposed ground floor plan (drawing no. 04) shall not be used as habitable accommodation unless it has first been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 9 - Full details of the boundary treatment shall be submitted and approved prior to the commencement of the development.  The boundary treatment shall be implemented as approved prior to the occupation of the development.
description: Erection of a first floor side extension, a part single storey part two storey rear extension, two rear roof extensions, with three front roof lights to a dwelling house in mutiple- occuption [maximum of 7 persons]
